Class ExperimentRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • ExperimentRun
  • public class ExperimentRun
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all of the information necessary for a single run of the experiment.
    Author:
    Mac Crompton

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ExperimentRun​(int id, java.lang.String description)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCommand​(ExperimentCommand command)
      Appends a command to the list of commands.
      This command should come chronologically during or after all other added commands.
      The command list sorts all commands in chronological order at the end of this function.
      Appending a command in proper chronological order is faster than appending in random order.
      java.lang.String getMetadata()  
      void run​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.net.Socket> sockets, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> serverMap)
      Executes the experimental run described by this experiment.
      Handles communication of experiment commands to all appropriate nodes within the experiment.
      As well as timing of all commands and receiving acknowledgments from experiment nodes.
      void setMetadata​(java.lang.String metadata)  

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExperimentRun

        public ExperimentRun​(int id,
                     java.lang.String description)
        Parameters:
        id - - A numeric identifier that must be unique to a specific run configuration
        description - - An english text description of the run (for debugging purposes)

    • Method Detail

      • addCommand

        public void addCommand​(ExperimentCommand command)
        Appends a command to the list of commands.
        This command should come chronologically during or after all other added commands.
        The command list sorts all commands in chronological order at the end of this function.
        Appending a command in proper chronological order is faster than appending in random order.
        Parameters:
        command - - The ExperimentCommand that should be appended.

      • run

        public void run​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.net.Socket> sockets,
                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> serverMap)
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                java.io.IOException
        Executes the experimental run described by this experiment.
        Handles communication of experiment commands to all appropriate nodes within the experiment.
        As well as timing of all commands and receiving acknowledgments from experiment nodes.
        Parameters:
        sockets - - A hashmap containing EXPERIMENT_NAME to client Socket mappings.
        serverMap - - A hashmap containing EXPERIMENT_NAME to DETER_NAME mappings. Used for acquiring the correct sockets.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - Thrown if this thread is interrupted outside of normal execution.
        java.io.IOException - - Thrown if Socket streams encounter an error.

      • getMetadata

        public java.lang.String getMetadata()
        Returns:
        Metadata pertaining to this particular run. Usually the duplicate identifier.

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata​(java.lang.String metadata)
        Parameters:
        metadata - Assign the metadata pertaining to this particular run a value.
